name: SUN RGB-D
description: Indoor scene understanding benchmark with RGB-D images annotated for detection and segmentation.

metrics.name: detection_accuracy
metrics.definition: Normalized detection accuracy over SUN RGB-D tasks

test_method: Perform 3D object detection or semantic segmentation using RGB-D inputs and score via official toolkit.
notes: Report task variant (detection vs segmentation) and whether depth data was consumed directly or projected.
